turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to place an order at the Starbucks, Goldenrod, Orlando, Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a cappuccino with 2% milk and whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place that order for you, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have placed an order for a cappachino with 2% milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks at golden rod in orlando, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is it. Thank you. Goodbye.
